hello every one i just joined the forum and bought the game ;D

game looks amazing and can't wait to play it but i have a quick question, what is it supposed to say if you bought the game compared to donating? :-\

Welcome aboard !

Currently the buying/donation system is rudimentary and is under a lot of work.

Thank you for your contributions
well I love supporting protects like this I always love seeing something new and interesting ;D
